Related repos

  • Data platform for analysis and visualization
  • open source BI and data viz system originally built at Yandex
  • Backups databases to cloud storage with progress notifications
  • Publishes data as websites and APIs
  • open source distributed SQL database with ACID transactions and horizontal scalability
  • Database manager for SQL and NoSQL across platforms
  • Integrated data platform combining spreadsheets and SQL
  • Portal for managing data application development
  • open-source BI tool for easy data analysis and dashboards
